soft smooth and spun just for crocheters **bella coco merino** is made from 100% extra-fine merino wool and features a special z-twist meaning it s designed to reduce splitting and give gorgeous stitch definition with every loop the dk weight and curated colorful palette make it perfect for wearables and accessories for all ages i m absolutely in love with the dreamy color range every shade is soft stylish and so easy to mix and match if you love texture and comfort this yarn is a total dream to work with this adjustable triangle shawl is worked from the center out using the cozy textured *** wheat stitch 1 *** creating a warm and elegant fabric with amazing drape we ll work the simple 4-row repeat back and forth building a triangle shape as we go the best part the size is totally up to you simply keep repeating the row pattern until your shawl is just the way you like it whether you want a dainty neck wrap or a full-sized statement piece a video tutorial is included with this pattern 2 crochet hook h 5 0mm -
